packages.name: MavensMate
packages.description: MavensMate for Sublime Text is a plugin that aims to replicate the functionality of the Eclipse-based Force.com IDE.
packages.author: joeferraro

osx.release_notes: Minor bug fix to major 3.4.8 release. Resolves VF page creation exception (thanks @dhoechst). OSX users: MavensMate.app 0.38.4 is available now. Release notes: http://mavensmate.com/Getting_Started/Release_Notes
